page.title: 01N Woolwich & Ferry: 05420179
page.content: Flat dwelling area, mainly highrise buildings of 20 storeys or so. Some building development of smaller houses. Have cleared dockyard area close to school and built a small estate of some houses and maisonettes and 3 storey flats. Large barracks being cleared off Francis Street - houses being built. The aim seems to be to get families into houses rather than high rises. Now developed an aquatic centre by the old dockyard. A recreation centre has a youth club, community centre, nursery playgroup for young children. The facilities are open to the general public and not just those from the dockyard area. The old clock house, an attractive building, has been retained and is now used as a community centre. A lot of effort is being made to improve quality of life in the area.
